column1: #Text=Lin says : " The joints are platinum , too !
#Text=Take the wounded back to Asami 's office !
#Text=" Lin says : " I 'll meet you there !
#Text=I 'm going to see if I can find any help !
#Text=" Varrick says : " All right , let 's fire it up again !
#Text=" Asami says : " I ca n't stabilize it !
#Text=" Daw says : " I hope you have something in here that can take out a platoon of mecha suits .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I know how to take down some mecha suits and it just might take down that giant , too .
#Text=Asami , disconnect anything electrical in here until we get back .
